description: Variation of Condition No. 3 (Approved plans) of Planning Permission Ref: P0388.22 dated 09/05/2022 to permit amended plans (Single storey side extension with lower ground floor basement room)
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates must be commenced not later than three years from the date of this permission.
Reason:- To comply with the requirements of Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004).
All new external finishes shall be carried out in materials to match those of the existing building(s) to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.
To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area.
The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out otherwise than in complete accordance with the approved plans (as set out on page one of this decision notice).
For the avoidance of doubt and to ensure that the development is carried out as approved.

The extension/basement room hereby permitted shall be used only for purposes incidental to the main dwelling house and at no time as a separate unit of accommodation. The connecting doorway as shown on drawing no. A0876-501 shall be installed in accordance with drawings and at no time shall it be removed or blocked up and a meaningful connection with the main dwelling house shall be maintained at all times.
To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area.

Statement Required by Article 35(2) of the Town and Country Planning (Development Management) Order 2015: No significant problems were identified during the consideration of the application, and therefore it has been determined in accordance with paragraph 38 of the National Planning Policy Framework 2018.
